headline: Peretz: Sharon must sack Netanyahu
description: If Sharon does not sack Finance Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, the prime minister will be complicit with the destruction of peace and the ruining of the advancement of the peace process, MK Amir Peretz (Labor) said today.    “Today it has become clear that the two heads of Likud are playing a double game. Netanyahu is boasting of the economic fruits of disengagement but is trying to torpedo the plan, while Sharon is supportive of the pullout to the outside world, but is really acting like a rabbit.” (Attila Somfalvi)
articleBody: If Sharon does not sack Finance Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, the prime minister will be complicit with the destruction of peace and the ruining of the advancement of the peace process, MK Amir Peretz (Labor) said today.    “Today it has become clear that the two heads of Likud are playing a double game. Netanyahu is boasting of the economic fruits of disengagement but is trying to torpedo the plan, while Sharon is supportive of the pullout to the outside world, but is really acting like a rabbit.” (Attila Somfalvi)
title: אלמנת הצוער שנספה באסון השריפה בכרמל מצאה אהבה חדשה
